mapper.select:
select aa.id,aa.comm_id,aa.comp_id,aa.role_id, aa.no,aa.begin_date,aa.end_date,aa.state,aa.type,aa.remark, aa.created_at,aa.created_by,aa.created_name,aa.modified_at,aa.modified_by,aa.modified_name, bb.name compName,cc.name commName,dd.name roleName from r_comm_role_agreement aa left join s_company bb on aa.comp_id = bb.id left join r_community cc ON aa.comm_id = cc.ID left join s_role dd on aa.role_id = dd.id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
